item.title: Docker container 로그 보기
item.description: 컨테이너 내 프로세스가 STDOUT, STDERR로 출력하는 로그 확인 $ docker logs --help Usage: docker logs [OPTIONS] CONTAINER Fetch the logs of a container Options: --details Show extra details provided to logs -f, --follow Follow log output --help Print usage --since string Show logs since timestamp (e.g. 2013-01-02T13:23:37) or relative (e.g. 42m for
